response.overview: A journey, a pilgrimage in the footsteps of Missak and Mélinée Manouchian through the voice of their great-niece Katia, who subtly traces the paths of two exceptional beings. Two survivors of the Armenian genocide who became leading figures in the French internal Resistance. So that their journeys, their militant commitments and their common fight for freedom are never erased from our collective memory.
response.title: Missak and Mélinée Manouchian
